title: How to join the LCS
body:
Hello everyone, My question here is how can i join the LCS with my team?

I mean like if we reach a high division in 5x5 like Diamond, Master or Challenger... How can we go for the qualifies or get noticed?

replies.body: I need a good team to climb with. I'm tired of losing bc of teammates.  Best roles are jgr and mid. Also playing more adc if someone wants to be my support for duos! Add me

*Lew* provided some awesome information here. There are some eligibility requirements and rules that you should review before moving forward, which you can find [**here.**](https://esports-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/production/files/rules/EU_Rulebook.pdf)

If you have any further questions, I'll do my best to answer them. Note that I'm not on the eSports team, so the information I can provide will be more limited than what an eSports member could offer. ^.^

They have an open qualifier that teams can sign up for to get into the Challenger series and I think the last one just ended recently.  You find all the details [here](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/eu-cs/eucs_2017_spring/about).
